User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; Trident/5.0)
Build Identifier: 4.0.1

When having a UpdatePanel in ASP and an UpdateProgress, Firefox fires an "BeginRequest" event but no "EndRequest" event. So the Problem is that the displayed gif for the loading animation will be shown on a request but won't dissapear.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Create a ASP.NET Website with updatepanel and updateprogress
2.trigger the updatepanel by a control
3.updateprogress will be shown but won't dissapear


Expected Results:  
firefox should fire the endrequest result.
